availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John A. Louden (Trimble County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of William Louden and Milly Louden. Married Sarah Richerson Louden in Trimble County in January 1864. Resident of Trimble County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Trimble County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, District 2, p. 379A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, p. 202.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Trimble County Marriages, Film #000420381, p. 232.
Find A Grave, "John A. Louden (1837-1914)," Memorial #22769114, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/22769114 (accessed December 17, 2019).
